name: Dragonair

evolution.description: Dragonair can evolve into Dragonite at level 16 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 12 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Dragon Pokémon. According to a witness, its body was surrounded by a strange aura that gave it a mystical look.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: If this Pokémon is affected by a negative status ailment, they can roll a d4 at the end of each of their turns. On a result of 4, they are cured.

abilities.name: Marvel Scale
abilities.description: This Pokémon's AC increase by 2 when suffering from a negative status condition.
